frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering Co-Located with KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2023
frontmatter.location: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2023 in Chicago, Illinois
frontmatter.price: In-Person and Virtual Attendance are Free
frontmatter.registration_text: Register to Attend In-person or Virtually
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering is on November 6 in Central Standard Time (CST)
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held live in Chicago, IL and broadcast live to regional watch parties around the globe. As always, our focus is on creating a space for peer-to-peer interactions and we'll be going hybrid, so if you are unable to attend in person, join us online. This Gathering will focus on Emerging Technology and Case Studies from and by End Users with production deployments of OpenShift sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and  lessons learned along the way. Topics covered during this Gathering include hybrid cloud infrastructure, cloud-native development, and new Emerging technology initiatives on the Edge.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on Central Standard Time (CST). Please note: In-person attendees are encouraged to also register for KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2023, however, it is not mandatory. Reception is Open to all registered attendees and starts at 5:00 p.m.
